data.title: Citizens Advice Cardiff and Vale
data.meta_description: Residents of the Vale of Glamorgan can access our services from these outreach locations, as well as our main office in Barry.
data.text:
Most face-to-face appointments are limited and available only to clients who have pre-booked through the Cardiff and Vale Advicelink service on 0808 278 7925 – see our telephone numbers page for more information.

Clients are invited to use our free phones and computers for their self-service advice needs – just speak to one of our reception staff.

Clients who need advice around the Cost of Living Crisis can drop in without an appointment every Monday and Thursday between 4pm and 6pm; clients who need advice around debt can drop in without an appointment every Wednesday between 1.30pm and 4pm.
